tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) due to an issue with the `down` function, where daemons may fail to shut down properly and hang indefinitely, causing excessive CPU usage and impacting other processes.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/F1bonacc1/process-compose` library to the patch version.
